text:
(show ranking|ranking) - show top players
<receiver>: +1 for <reason> - give +1 to <receiver> (full name) because he did <reason>
Events:
debug - {user: <user object to send message to>}
please 9gag me - Returns a random meme image
please <user> doesn't have <role> role - Removes a role from a user
please <user> has <role> role - Assigns a role to a user
please <user> is a badass guitarist - assign a role to a user
please <user> is not a badass guitarist - remove a role from a user
please I need some advice
please animate me <query> - The same thing as `image me`, except adds a few parameters to try to return an animated GIF instead.
please bb <number> - 정답 추측
please bb start - 숫자 야구 게임 시작
please chess me - Creates a new game between yourself and another person in the room
please chess move <to> - Moves a piece to the coordinate position using standard chess notation
please chess status - Gets the current state of the board
please cowsay <statement> - Returns a cow that says what you want
please daily deal - <It will show you Steam's daily deal>
please die - End please process
please echo <text> - Reply back with <text>
please fake event <event> - Triggers the <event> event for debugging reasons
please fortune me - Displays a super true fortune
please hangman <character> - guess answer
please hangman <word> - guess answer
please hangman start - start hangman game
please help - Displays all of the help commands that please knows about.
please help <query> - Displays all help commands that match <query>.
please how do you handle (.*)
please image me <query> - The Original. Queries Google Images for <query> and returns a random top result.
please map me <query> - Returns a map view of the area returned by `query`.
please mustache me <query> - Searches Google Images for the specified query and mustaches it.
please mustache me <url> - Adds a mustache to the specified URL.
please ping - Reply with pong
please pug bomb N - get N pugs
please pug me - Receive a pug
please quiz - start movie quiz
please quiz <answer> - guess the answer
please quiz <answer> - test which answer is correct or not
please quiz hint - get hint
please quiz hint - get hint
please quiz pass - pass the quiz
please quiz remind - remind quiz
please quiz start - start movie quiz
please quiz update <from> - update newest quiz (매우 무거움! from은 YYYY-MM-dd 형식으로)
please quiz update <from>[ <to>]- update newest quiz (매우 무거움! 날짜는 YYYY-MM-dd 형식으로)
please show storage - Display the contents that are persisted in the brain
please show users - Display all users that please knows about
please the rules - Make sure please still knows the rules.
please time - Reply with current time
please translate me <phrase> - Searches for a translation for the <phrase> and then prints that bad boy out.
please translate me from <source> into <target> <phrase> - Translates <phrase> from <source> into <target>. Both <source> and <target> are optional
please url encode|decode <query> - URL encode or decode <string>
please url form encode|decode <query> - URL form-data encode or decode <string>
please what do you think about (.*)
please what role does <user> have - Find out what roles are assigned to a specific user
please what should I do about (.*)
please who has admin role - Find out who's an admin and can assign roles
please who is <user> - see what roles a user has
please wiki me <query> - Searches for <query> on Wikipedia.
please youtube me <query> - Searches YouTube for the query and returns the video embed link.
please youtube me <query> - Searches YouTube for the query and returns the video embed link.
ship it - Display a motivation squirrel
who thanks me - show how many people thank me and why
